query: The subset of activities 29, 30, 32 is completed at the same time period

p:32/29: activity 29 must be completed before starting activity 32

r:2/30: resource 2 is scarce at time period 30 due to activities 12, 17, 19, 2, 20, 21, 24, 28, 3, 31, 6, 7
r:2/32: resource 2 is scarce at time period 32 due to activities 12, 17, 19, 2, 20, 21, 24, 28, 3, 31, 6, 7
